「恒等式」-变格.desc: A functional W-Engine that specializes in energy conversion. It can analyze combat environments and generate special sounds to disrupt the enemy's offense.

「恒等式」-本格.desc: A W-Engine with a component structure adjusted according to specific parameters. It can enhance the defensive capabilities of those who have a certain style of combat.

「月相」-晦.desc: A W-Engine with excellent sonic and thermal energy usage, capable of hitting its target with a double whammy.

「月相」-朔.desc: A high-capacity portable W-Engine that can collect dissipated energy from its surroundings, thus enhancing the combat effectiveness of its operator.

「月相」-望.desc: A W-Engine that prioritizes damage output over noise reduction. It can indiscriminately deal considerable damage to all units nearby.

「残响」-Ⅲ型.desc: A special W-Engine that features motion capture algorithms, which enhance the overall combat competency of your squad.

「残响」-Ⅱ型.desc: A standardized W-Engine with balanced performance that enhances its owner's and their teammates' combat effectiveness in all aspects.

「残响」-Ⅰ型.desc: A special W-Engine featuring a built-in sonic generator that boosts its damage output.

「湍流」-斧型.desc: A frequency-converting W-Engine that can quickly generate excessive power and effectively increase its user's battle prowess.

「湍流」-矢型.desc: A tactical W-Engine that locates enemies using high-frequency sound waves. Its aiming aid can make its operator's precision attack more deadly.

「湍流」-铳型.desc: An energy-storage type W-Engine with a unique operation circuit. It will absorb scattered energy up to a certain amount before unleashing it all at once.

「电磁暴」-叁式.desc: A high-capacity W-Engine that features a built-in generator, which allows it to keep a stable storage of electrical power.

「电磁暴」-壹式.desc: A special W-Engine that can analyze the target's weak spots through real-time calculations.

「电磁暴」-贰式.desc: A damage-type W-Engine that features an enhanced movement detection module that can quickly alter its output intensity to optimize battle efficiency.

人为刀俎.desc: A high-power W-Engine that boasts a cutting-edge energy conversion system. It collects excess heat and supplies it to the steamer.

仿制星徽引擎.desc: A customized supercomputing W-Engine, specialized in aim support and ballistic calculations. Modified by Billy, it now looks like some sort of knock-off Starlight Knight figurine.
仿制星徽引擎.JA: なんちゃってスターライトエンジン

兔能环.desc: A special W-Engine decorated with a fluffy bunny. However, it is just an imitation of the real animal.
兔能环.JA: ラビットチャージャー

加农转子.desc: A high-performance supercomputing W-Engine, capable of collecting real-time battlefield data and equipped with mini cannons.

双生泣星.desc: A W-Engine produced by recycling abandoned Bangboo shells. Its electrode cores made of recycled metals can release high-voltage charges.

含羞恶面.desc: An intricate W-Engine developed by Section 6 and later modified with extra features. It can control Ether particles to form an energy field. This model is favored by Soukaku.

啜泣摇篮.desc: A special W-Engine with multiple layers embedded inside. It can quickly recharge 	special-model Bangboo and custom-made combat equipment. This model is favored by Rina.

奔袭獠牙.desc: A versatile W-Engine based on a motorcycle tire that Big Daddy made for Caesar.

好斗的阿炮.desc: A support W-Engine propelled by jets that is both mobile and impactful, it can traverse the entire battlefield providing combat buffs.
好斗的阿炮.JA: 喧嘩腰のボンバルダム

家政员.desc: An enhanced W-Engine with a high rotation speed. A chainsaw has been integrated into its shaft. This model is often used by Corin.

嵌合编译器.desc: The latest W-Engine that possesses a hypercalculation core. It can compile operational codes for machines at top speed. This model is favored by Grace.

左轮转子.desc: A special W-Engine modeled after a revolver. It can load bullet-shaped condensed Ether batteries, which release a great amount of power when fired.

强音热望.desc: Gather 'round, mortals! Turn up the music!

德玛拉电池Ⅱ型.desc: A customized W-Engine that focuses on energy storage, modified to improve its energy capacity. This model is often used by Anby.

拘缚者.desc: A special W-Engine with a powerful temperature control system. Modified by Lycaon, it has the capability to quickly create extremely cold environments.

旋钻机-赤轴.desc: Originally a rev-enhanced W-Engine, it has been modified by Anton with the most expensive rotary drill parts that allow it to exceed its output limits.
旋钻机-赤轴.JA: ドリルリグ-レッドシャフト

时光切片.desc: A special W-Engine equipped with a high-speed camera module. The best choice for in-Hollow photography enthusiasts.

时流贤者.desc: A new model of supercomputing W-Engine custom-made by HSO Section 6, equipped with the most elite calculation and analysis functions.

星徽引擎.desc: A damage-type W-Engine made of special Etheric matter. When its user is attacked, it builds up energy.
星徽引擎.JA: スターライトエンジン

春日融融.desc: A special W-Engine equipped with a temperature regulator where residual heat generated by the W-Engine's high frequency is funneled into the hot springs on its surface.

正版变身器.desc: An epic W-Engine favored by Starlight Knight fans. Its high popularity and scarcity marketing strategy have caused an influx of knock-offs.

残心青囊.desc: Bitterness and pain beget hope, and he devours them all.

比格气缸.desc: A powerful protection-type W-Engine, characterized by thick oil cylinders that ceaselessly roar inside it. It can provide sufficient power for heavy machinery.

淬锋钳刺.desc: A deadly W-Engine from unknown sources, modified personally by Jane Doe with the intent to deal severe physical damage and Anomaly.

深海访客.desc: A high-power W-Engine that possesses efficient freezing capabilities and high damage output. This model is often used by Ellen.
深海访客.JA: ディープシー・ビジター

灼心摇壶.desc: Modified by Burnice, this W-Engine uses a special fuel as its power source to boost combustion performance to the max.
灼心摇壶.JA: バーニング・シェイカー

焰心桂冠.desc: A violent W-Engine that can ignite flames with a siphon. It deals simple and crude burn damage, encouraging relentless, bone-crushing follow-up attacks.

燃狱齿轮.desc: A functional W-Engine with ultra-high power capacity. Modified by Koleda, its energy level has almost exceeded the safety limit.

玉壶青冰.desc: A custom stun W-Engine made for an Automaton referencing the combat style and abilities of one. Energy is stored within, then lashes outwards upon conversion.

硫磺石.desc: A W-Engine made for Soldier 11 by Obsidian Division. Its intense heat can be used to clear the entire battlefield.

维序者-特化型.desc: A defensive W-Engine independently researched and created by Public Security which simplifies the offensive components to enhance the energy conversion ability in its shield.
维序者-特化型.JA: 秩序の守り手・特化型

聚宝箱.desc: A cost-effective W-Engine that can store energy, with improvements made to its internal space. This model is often used by Nicole.

街头巨星.desc: A custom-made W-Engine designed for urban music lovers. It sacrifices heat dissipation components for improved sound quality.

触电唇彩.desc: This damage-type W-Engine boasts a built-in current transformer, and automatically attracts electrically sensitive objects around the operator and deals additional damage to them.

贵重骨核.desc: A special W-Engine whose outer shell is made of composite Etheric matter that effectively absorbs impact, and turns it against the enemy.

轰鸣座驾.desc: An energy W-Engine modded from spare parts of a truck's engine. It converts the original cylinder into an energy storage unit, which is highly advantageous.
轰鸣座驾.JA: グロウル・マイ・カー

逍遥游球.desc: A new supercomputing W-Engine, featuring cutting-edge integrated chips that dynamically monitor the battlefield and provide tactical analysis for the user.

鎏金花信.desc: A W-Engine with a grandiose and luxurious appearance equipped with a premium Ether-powered anti-theft device. It's actually used to provide the equipper with energy.

钢铁肉垫.desc: A supercomputing W-Engine equipped with a motion monitoring feature. Thanks to Nekomata's modifications, it perfectly matches the fast reflexes and combat maneuvers of feline Thirens.

防暴者Ⅵ型.desc: The latest tactical W-Engine used by Public Security's elite Hollow squads, possessing a powerful Ether energy source. It's Zhu Yuan's favored model.

雨林饕客.desc: A consumer-class W-Engine launched by an exotic pet fan club to promote pet culture. Due to its cute appearance, it was once a very popular model.

霰落星殿.desc: Hail falls before the shrine, waking her. The blizzard is coming.
